chapter1.html.body: GitBook中的book.json配置 { "language" : "zh-hans", "plugins": [ "-search", "search-pro", "puml", "include-codeblock" ], "pluginsConfig": { "search-pro": { "cutWordLib": "nodejieba", "defineWord" : ["Gitbook Use"] } } } 插件参考 http://chuansong.me/n/1137976951453 changyong 其他基本设置 test1 test2 test3 By haozi            updated 2019-01-26 07:48
